vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 27, “Minimum Property Standards,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 27-46 and 27-53; (1) adding provisions to the definition of code violations in the Chapter 27 habitual nuisance properties program; (2) changing the annual fee for habitual criminal and nuisance properties to a monthly fee; (3) providing a penalty not to exceed $500.00; (4) providing a saving clause; (5) providing a severability clause; and (6) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
